meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>former</kanji> <kanji>calendar</kanji> is the calendar from before. It's the <vocabulary>lunisolar calendar</vocabulary> and the <vocabulary>traditional Japanese calendar</vocabulary>. Certainly not the current calendar, anyways.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
